1.name: Designer T-Shirt
1.description: Premium cotton designer t-shirt with a modern fit. Features a unique graphic design that's both stylish and comfortable for everyday wear. Available in multiple sizes.

1.name: Premium Jeans
1.description: High-quality denim jeans with a perfect balance of comfort and durability. Features a classic five-pocket design and a versatile slim fit that pairs well with any top in your wardrobe.

1.name: Leather Jacket
1.description: Genuine leather jacket with a timeless design. Features a soft inner lining, multiple pockets, and durable zippers. Perfect for adding a touch of edge to any outfit while keeping you warm.

1.name: Summer Dress
1.description: Light and flowing summer dress made from breathable fabric. Features a floral pattern and an elegant design that's perfect for warm weather occasions, from beach outings to summer parties.

2.name: Wireless Earbuds
2.description: Premium wireless earbuds with noise cancellation technology. Features crystal-clear sound quality, comfortable fit, and 8 hours of battery life on a single charge. Includes a compact charging case.

2.name: Smart Watch
2.description: Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring features including heart rate, sleep tracking, and activity detection. Includes a bright AMOLED display, water resistance, and 5-day battery life.

2.name: Bluetooth Speaker
2.description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with immersive 360Â° sound. Features 12 hours of playtime, IPX7 waterproof rating, and a rugged design perfect for outdoor activities. Pairs easily with any Bluetooth-enabled device.

2.name: Phone Charger
2.description: Fast-charging USB-C power adapter with smart charging technology. Compatible with all modern smartphones and tablets. Includes a 6-foot braided cable for durability and tangle-free use.

3.name: Organic Olive Oil
3.description: Premium cold-pressed organic olive oil from family-owned groves. This extra virgin olive oil has a rich, fruity flavor perfect for salads, cooking, or dipping. Bottled in a dark glass container to preserve freshness.

3.name: Artisan Cheese
3.description: Handcrafted artisan cheese aged to perfection. Made from the milk of grass-fed cows and crafted using traditional methods. This semi-hard cheese has nutty, complex flavors that pair wonderfully with wine or fruit.

3.name: Fresh Pasta
3.description: Freshly made pasta using traditional Italian techniques. Made with semolina flour and farm-fresh eggs for an authentic texture and taste. Cooks in just 2-3 minutes for a quick and delicious meal.

3.name: Exotic Fruits
3.description: Selection of premium exotic fruits sourced from around the world. This colorful assortment includes dragon fruit, passion fruit, star fruit, and more. Perfect for fruit platters, smoothies, or enjoying as a healthy snack.

4.name: Throw Pillows
4.description: Set of two decorative throw pillows with removable covers. Made from soft, durable fabric with elegant patterns that complement any living space. The perfect accent pieces to add comfort and style to your sofa or bed.

4.name: Table Lamp
4.description: Modern table lamp with an adjustable arm and warm lighting. Features a stylish metal base, fabric shade, and energy-efficient LED bulb. Perfect for bedside tables, desks, or living room side tables.

4.name: Ceramic Vase
4.description: Handcrafted ceramic vase with a unique, textured finish. Each piece has slight variations making it one-of-a-kind. Perfect for displaying fresh or dried flower arrangements and adding an artistic touch to any room.

4.name: Kitchen Utensils
4.description: Complete set of 5 stainless steel kitchen utensils with ergonomic handles. Includes spatula, slotted spoon, ladle, pasta server, and serving spoon. Dishwasher safe and designed for durability and everyday use.

5.name: Running Shoes
5.description: Lightweight performance running shoes with responsive cushioning. Features breathable mesh upper, supportive midsole, and durable rubber outsole for excellent traction. Designed for comfort during long-distance runs or daily training.

5.name: Yoga Mat
5.description: Eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat with optimal thickness for joint protection. Made from TPE material that's both durable and biodegradable. Includes a carrying strap for easy transportation to and from your yoga practice.

5.name: Basketball
5.description: Official size and weight basketball with superior grip and durability. Features a high-quality composite leather cover and deep channel design. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor play on various court surfaces.

5.name: Fitness Tracker
5.description: Advanced fitness tracker that monitors steps, heart rate, sleep quality, and more. Features a bright color display, water resistance up to 50m, and 7-day battery life. Syncs wirelessly with a smartphone app to track your fitness progress.
